summary: Black, brown and polar bears retextured to look like their real life counter-parts
descriptionHtml:

[heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Black, brown and polar bears retextured to look like their real life counter-parts
Check User images for comparison! (THX whoever up'd that :D )

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\
